required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A 12-Week Study in Asthmatic Children Ages 6 to <12 Years, Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of Symbicort pMDI 80/2.25 μg and Symbicort pMDI 80/4.5 μg, Compared With Budesonide pMDI 80 μg
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, 12-Week, Double-Blind, Randomized, Parallel-Group, Multicenter Study Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of Symbicort pMDI 80/2.25 μg, 2 Actuations Twice Daily, and Symbicort pMDI 80/4.5 μg, 2 Actuations Twice Daily, Compared With Budesonide pMDI 80 μg, 2 Actuations Twice Daily, in Children Ages 6 to <12 Years With Asthma

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose is to investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Symbicort pMDI 80/2.25 μg and Symbicort pMDI 80/4.5 μg, Compared with Budesonide pMDI 80 μg, 2 Actuations Twice Daily, in Children Ages 6 to <12 Years with Asthma during 12 weeks.

detailed_description.textblock: A Phase 3, 12-Week, Double-Blind, Randomized, Parallel-Group, Multicenter Study Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of Symbicort pMDI 80/2.25 μg, 2 Actuations Twice Daily, and Symbicort pMDI 80/4.5 μg, 2 Actuations Twice Daily, Compared with Budesonide pMDI 80 μg, 2 Actuations Twice Daily, in Children Ages 6 to <12 Years with Asthma

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in one-hour post-dose forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1)
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to Week 12 in one-hour post-dose FEV1

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in one-hour post-dose clinic FVC (L)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Weeks 2, 4, 8 and 12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to one-hour post-dose FVC at Weeks 2, 4, 8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in one-hour post-dose clinic FEF25-75 (L/s) measured in the clinic
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Weeks 2,4,8 and 12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to one-hour post-dose FEF25-75 at Weeks 2, 4, 8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in one-hour post-dose peak expiratory flow (PEF) (L/min) measured in the clinic (clinic PEF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Weeks 2,4,8 and 12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to one-hour post-dose PEF at Weeks 2, 4, 8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in one-hour post-dose FEV1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Weeks 2, 4 and 8
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in one-hour post dose FEV1 at Weeks 2, 4 and 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pre-dose clinic FEV1 in liter (L).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Week 2,4,8 and12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to pre-dose FEV1 at Weeks 2,4,8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pre-dose clinic FVC (L)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Week 2,4,8 and12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to pre-dose FVC (L) at Weeks 2,4,8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pre-dose clinic FEF25-75 (L/s)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Week 2,4,8 and12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to pre-dose FEF25-75 at Weeks 2,4,8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pre-dose clinic Peak expiratory flow (PEF) (L/min)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Week 2, 4, 8 and12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to pre-dose PEF at Weeks 2, 4, 8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fifteen-minute post-dose clinic FEV1 (L)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Week 12.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to one-hour post-dose FEV1 at Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fifteen-minute post-dose clinic clinic FVC (L)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Week 12.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to one-hour post-dose FVC at Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fifteen-minute post-dose clinic FEF25-75 (L/s)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Week 12.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to one-hour post-dose FEF25-75 at Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fifteen-minute post-dose clinic PEF (L/min)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Week 12.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to one-hour post-dose clinic PEF (L/min) at Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to occurrence of first asthma exacerbation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomized 12-week treatment period
secondary_outcome.description: Time in days from randomization until first exacerbation during the 12-week treatment period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in nighttime awakenings due to asthma symptoms requiring reliever use recorded in the eDiary during the single blind run in and the double blind treatment periods
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as percentage of nighttime awakenings during the last 7 days of run-in. Week 12 taken as percentage of nighttime awakenings during Treatment Week 12.
secondary_outcome.description: Change in percentage of nighttime awakenings from baseline Treatment Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in paediatric Asthma Quality of Life Questionnaire with Standardised Activities (PAQLQ[S]) scores (overall and each domain)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken at Week 0 then at Weeks 4, 8 and 12
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline PAQLQ(S) to mean of Weeks 4, 8 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in morning and evening FEV1 (L) recorded in the electronic diary (eDiary)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as the mean of the last 7 days of the run-in period. Week 12 taken as the mean during Week 12 of the treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline mean in diary FEV1 to mean at Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in nighttime reliever medication use recorded in the eDiary
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as the mean of the last 7 days of the run-in period. Week 12 taken as the mean during Week 12 of the treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from mean baseline to Treatment Week 12 mean in nighttime reliever medication use.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in daytime reliever medication use recorded in the eDiary
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as the mean of the last 7 days of the run-in period. Week 12 taken as the mean during Week 12 of the treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from mean baseline to Treatment Week 12 mean in daytime reliever medication use.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in total daily reliever medication use recorded in the eDiary
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as the mean of the last 7 days of the run-in period. Week 12 taken as the mean during Week 12 of the treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from mean baseline to Treatment Week 12 mean in total reliever medication use.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in nighttime asthma symptom scores recorded in the eDiary
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as the mean of the last 7 days of the run-in period. Week 12 taken as the mean during Week 12 of the treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from mean baseline score to mean score during Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in daytime asthma symptom scores recorded in the eDiary
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as the mean of the last 7 days of the run-in period. Week 12 taken as the mean during Week 12 of the treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from mean baseline score to mean score during Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in total daily asthma symptom scores recorded in the eDiary
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline taken as the mean of the last 7 days of the run-in period. Week 12 taken as the mean during Week 12 of the treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: Change from mean baseline score to mean score during Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to discontinuation of investigational product (IP).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomized 12-week treatment period
secondary_outcome.description: Time in days from randomization until discontinuation of investigational product during the 12-week treatment period

arm_group.description: Budesonide/formoterol pMDI 80/2.25 µg, 2 acuations twice daily

intervention.description: Budesonide/formoterol pMDI 80/2.25 µg, 2 acuations twice daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Has a documented clinical diagnosis of asthma defined by the ATS for at least 6 months prior to Visit 2
- Have a morning pre-bronchodilator clinic FEV1 measured at least 6 hours after the last dose of inhaled SABA and at least 48 hours after last dose of inhaled LABA of 60% to 100% of predicted normal
- Demonstrated reversibility of clinic FEV1 of ≥12% from pre -albuterol/salbutamol level within 15 to 30 minutes after administration of a standard dose of albuterol/salbutamol.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have been hospitalized at least once or required emergency treatment more than once for an asthma-related condition during the 6 months prior to Visit 1
- Have required treatment with systemic corticosteroids (eg, oral, parenteral, or rectal) for any reason within the 6 weeks prior to Visit 1

overall_official.affiliation: Colorado Allergy Asthma Centers, PC, US
